Follow us!

Sponsors

Founded in 2011, Fastly is a next generation cloud acceleration platform. At Fastly, we think slow is unacceptable. Fastly enables a next-generation of businesses to give their users the best web and mobile experience. Our patent-pending Fastly Caching Software delivers static, dynamic, and streaming content with the lowest recorded latency.

GitHub is the best place to share code with friends, co-workers, classmates, and complete strangers. Over six million people use GitHub to build amazing things together.

Hack Reactor is a 3-month immersive coding school focused on computer science fundamentals and JavaScript. Hack Reactor grads work at companies like Google, Adobe, OpenTable, Amazon, and numerous startups. Hack Reactor's mission is twofold: to empower people and to transform education through rapid-iteration teaching.

Indiegogo empowers people around the world to fund what matters to them. As the largest global crowdfunding platform, campaigns have launched from every country around the world with millions of dollars being distributed every week. The company is headquartered in San Francisco, with offices in Los Angeles and New York.

New Relic is a software analytics company that makes sense of billions of data points about millions of applications in real time. Our comprehensive SaaS-based solution provides one powerful interface for web and native mobile applications and consolidates the performance monitoring data for any chosen technology in your environment.

Nginx, Inc., the team behind NGINX Open Source, has built NGINX Plus, a fully-supported, commercial version of the high-performance web delivery software. Powering over 140 million sites globally, NGINX enables companies to match increasing demand for faster web experiences at scale. NGINX Plus has all the power and scalability of the Open Source product and adds enterprise-class features such as application load balancing, application health checks, activity monitoring and on-the-fly configuration.

O'Reilly spreads the knowledge of innovators through its technology books, online services, magazines, research, and tech conferences. Since 1978, O'Reilly has been a chronicler and catalyst of leading-edge development, homing in on the technology trends that really matter and galvanizing their adoption by amplifying "faint signals" from the alpha geeks who are creating the future. An active participant in the technology community, O'Reilly has a long history of advocacy, meme-making, and evangelism.

Twilio provides an API platform that helps developers build communications solutions that meet their specific needs. Whether integrating voice, messaging or VoIP capabilities into a web or mobile app, Twilio removes traditional obstacles to engineering effective communications experiences.
